attributeDefinition: ID of 50-m sampling transect within each landscape block.
ID of tree within each sampling transect. Multiple row for a tree means that the tree has more than one stem (one row per stem).
Diameter of stem in cm at 1.3 m height.
Categorical variable indicating if a tree is single-stemmed or has multiple stems. S
Presence of basal sprouts for a tree. 0
unit: Living stem with no visible loss of branches. L1
attributeType: living stem with <1/3 of branches dead. L2
driverAttribute: living stem with 1/3-2/3 of branches dead. L3
responseAttribute: living stem with >2/3 of branches dead. D

attributeDefinition: Length of sampling transect in meters.
